meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling a canopic jar.
meanings.sent1: The canopic decorations on the jar were beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed an ancient canopic jar.
meanings.sent3: The canopic jar looked like a tiny treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: Her room had a canopic vibe with its ornate jars.
meanings.sent5: The canopic design was etched into the stone walls.

meanings.definition: A jar used by the ancient Egyptians to hold the organs of a mummified body.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologists found a canopic jar in the tomb.
meanings.sent2: The canopic contained the preserved organs of the pharaoh.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistook the canopic for a hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: The canopic stood as a guardian of the deceased's organs.
meanings.sent5: The canopic jar gleamed under the museum lights.
